typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	hashVal as string,
	TargetID as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> DataVaultSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SATSource
DataVaultSource derive(HKey = toString(sha2(256, byName($hashVal)))) ~> hashKeys
hashKeys, TargetSATKey exists(HKey == hashID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistRows
HUBSource derive(hashID = toString(byName($TargetID))) ~> TargetHubKey
AlterRow1 select(mapColumn(
		HKey,
		each(match(name==$hashVal))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NewHubRecords
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		HKey,
		each(match(name!=$hashVal))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
SATSource derive(hashID = toString(byName($TargetID))) ~> TargetSATKey
Select2, TargetSATKey exists(HKey == hashID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SatRowsExist
ExistRows alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
SatRowsExist alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> NewSATRecords
hashKeys derive(LoadDateTime = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
NewHubRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		HKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> HubLoad
NewSATRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> SATLoad
